name: Ralen_Margok
content:
Ralen Margok was a Zabrak male who was a member of the Nova Blades pirates more than a century before 3637 BBY. Margok was aboard the pirate starship Aggressor when it crash-landed on the planet Rishi, and he was instrumental in converting the vessel into a base of operations for the Blades. As a result, Margok's descendants, including Dael Margok, became major players in the Blades in the decades that followed.
Ralen Margok was mentioned in the Codex entry for his descendant Dael Margok in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
